str2: From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From sun and poreuomai; to journey together; by implication, to assemble.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Strengthened from the base of trope; to twist, i.e. Turn quite around or reverse.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
